Creating recipesÂ¶

To analyze the emotion contained in a sentence in English, you can use pymoood.anlaysis_emotion() function This function analyzes the mood of sentences collected in English and returns emoticons that fit the situation.

pymoood.analysis_emotion(kind=<class 'str'>)Â¶

The pymoood.EmotionPredictor class is used to predict the emotion of a given text and return the corresponding emoji.

pymoood.EmotionPredict(model_path=None, vectorizer_path=None, label_encoder_path=None)Â¶

The EmotionPredictor class is used to predict the emotion of a given text and return the corresponding emoji.
